verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:11
verses.text: And the wings of the cherubims were twenty cubits long: one wing of the one cherub was five cubits, reaching to the wall of the house: and the other wing was likewise five cubits, reaching to the wing of the other cherub.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:12
verses.text: And one wing of the other cherub was five cubits, reaching to the wall of the house: and the other wing was five cubits also, joining to the wing of the other cherub.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:13
verses.text: The wings of these cherubims spread themselves forth twenty cubits: and they stood on their feet, and their faces were inward.
